title: What is CS1041?
labels: All compiler errors have to be fixed

sections.title: Symptoms
content: When trying to enter play mode, I am receiving the error below:

sections.title: Cause
content: The CS1041 error is caused when a method does not define a parameter type or parameter name. In the example below we have removed the parameter type "int".

sections.title: Resolution
content: To fix the CS1041 error you will need to make sure that both the parameter type and the parameter identifier are defined.
